original_title: Ich bin den Sommer Ã¼ber in Berlin geblieben
overview: Nadine is obsessed by a memory linked to a haunting tune she can no longer sing, until she hears someone else singing and everything falls back into place again. A melancholic observation of two young couples having difficulties trusting one another. They are full of skepticism and searching for a purpose in life.
title: I Stayed in Berlin All Summer
